wikipedia_page.main: Barbara Patricia Tizard,  (née Parker; 16 April 1926 – 4 January 2015) was a British psychologist and academic, specialising in developmental psychology. She was Director of the Thomas Coram Research Unit at the Institute of Education, University of London from 1980 to 1990, and Professor of Education from 1982 to 1990.

response: * Barbara Tizard (1926–2015), British psychologist and academic
